title: The Family: the boy who lived alone
brief_description: A young boy, Billy, runs away from home. As he walks, he observes others who appear lonesome. The film captures many of the thoughts Billy has about his family. After a wet, uncomfortable night in an abandoned house, Billy’s desire to become part of his family again increases and he decides to return home at daybreak.
